DOC.brief_summary: To test effect ASEA consumption 24-hour rest energy expenditure . Hypothesis : consumption 8-oz ASEA water ( 4-oz breakfast 4-oz bedtime ) significantly elevate 24-h rest energy expenditure compare consumption placebo control ( salt water , dietary intake ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect ASEA Energy Expenditure Fat Oxidation Humans
DOC.detailed_description: The ASEA beverage special oral formulation produce pure saline solution contain 123 mg sodium 129 mg chloride per 4 oz . serve . A proprietary electrolytic catalytic process rearranges salt water solution mimic redox signal molecular composition native salt-water compound find around human cell . Data obtain thus far , suggest possibility consumption ASEA beverage may increase energy expenditure thus beneficial treatment obesity , however , assess human clinical study . To end , measure effect ASEA consumption energy expenditure indirect calorimetry use indirect room calorimeter University North Carolina ( UNC ) Nutrition Research Institute . The primary outcome measure change 24-h energy expenditure respiratory quotient response ASEA consumption . The secondary outcome variable include change relevant peptide hormone , norepinephrine/epinephrine relationship change energy expenditure response consumption ASEA .
